Bruins-Canadiens Sum
06 Nov 2019, 04:16 by EndPlay
First Period_1, Montreal, Mete 2 (Armia, Petry), 1:13. 2, Boston, Pastrnak 15 (Krug, Bergeron), 14:55 (pp). 3, Montreal, Tatar 5 (Chiarot, Gallagher), 16:45. 4, Montreal, Byron 1, 17:16.
Second Period_5, Boston, Clifton 1, 7:17. 6, Boston, Bjork 2 (McAvoy), 18:13. 7, Montreal, Mete 3 (Petry, Lehkonen), 18:55.
Third Period_8, Boston, Kuraly 1 (Wagner), 3:03. 9, Montreal, Chiarot 2 (Tatar, Weber), 9:06.
Shots on Goal_Boston 6-9-10_25. Montreal 13-12-6_31.
Power-play opportunities_Boston 1 of 2; Montreal 0 of 2.
Goalies_Boston, Rask 7-1-1 (31 shots-26 saves). Montreal, Price 7-4-1 (25-21).
A_21,302 (21,288). T_2:33.
Referees_Marc Joannette, Francois St Laurent. Linesmen_Kyle Flemington, Trent Knorr.
